placeInfo: {'id': '12210527', 'name': 'Fox Resorts Jaffna', 'rating': 5, 'numberOfReviews': 399, 'locationString': 'Jaffna, Northern Province', 'latitude': 9.701406, 'longitude': 80.01645, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304135-d12210527-Reviews-Fox_Resorts_Jaffna-Jaffna_Northern_Province.html', 'website': 'https://www.foxresorts.com/fox-jaffna', 'address': '257 KKS Road, Kokuvil, Jaffna, Jaffna 40000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '257 KKS Road, Kokuvil, Jaffna', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Jaffna', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '40000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 1, 'count2': 2, 'count3': 10, 'count4': 64, 'count5': 323}}
text: My family and I had a wonderful experience at FOX Resorts in Jaffna. The resort is beautiful with lots of green space and the rooms are spacious, clean, and comfortable. The food was amazing every day, with a great authentic taste! The service was phenomenal, and the host and waiters were all incredibly welcoming and helpful. Our host Traveen often asked if there was any dish in particular that we wanted to try, and arranged for the chef to prepare them during our stay - the crab curries and mutton curries were very delicious! On top of that, we greatly enjoyed having excellent Sri Lankan tea morning and evening made by two of the incredible staff - Scotty and Mithushan - who were especially friendly, warm, and attentive during our stay! The resort was well situated in Jaffna in a nice area and close to a variety of shops. I would absolutely return here for my next visit to Jaffna!
title: A lovely experience at Fox Resorts! Would highly recommend!

text: This hotel is a jewel. Lunch manicured gardens,  a wonderfully refreshing pool, colonial buildings. Wonderful. A special mention goes to the buffet dinner. The best we had in 10 days in Sri Lanka. Really authentic food (so much so that the restaurant was full the night we went, full of returning Tamils on holidays and their local extended families - and the food was very much appreciated by them. Dining in the garden is a joy and if you are lucky enough to be served by Scotty you will be taken care of like a king - he has a very special way of anticipating your needs and elegantly meeting them. The receptionist (I didn’t get his name) was also very kind and brought us a plate of the deviled chicken straight to our table when it was refreshed in the buffet (after seeing how much we liked it) - exemplary service!
title: A jewel in Jaffna

text: As a Tamil returning to Jaffna after 20 years, Fox Jaffna was a haven for my family. Fox Jaffna had exceptionally well facilitated and clean rooms, a refreshing pool that we used as a family every day and the food was so delicious. In fact my mum who is particular about her food, came over with my dad for dinner twice. I would like to give a big thanks to Suji who was our waiter and was incredibly attentive and warm towards us. He left us with a lasting impression of the culture of Fox Resort. Arun, who also works at Fox Jaffna, was also professsional and friendly.
title: Fox Jaffna - Suji and Arun

text: Such a beautiful boutique resort! Stunningly serene and tucked away from the main road, the aesthetics of the buildings and lush green surrounds feel distinctive to the area, extending to the delicious Jaffna-style cuisine and real Sri Lankan tea, which we had yet to properly experience anywhere else. The food was a highlight of our trip, made even better by the exceptional service provided by Scoty and Nithurshan all throughout. They were both so attentive, knowledgeable (Scoty is Fox’s resident tea expert!) and genuinely lovely. We looked forward to seeing their friendly faces and chatting each day and really appreciated how they went above and beyond to make our stay a memorable one. Highly recommend!
title: An authentic Jaffna experience - this is the place to stay!

roomTip: Ask for an itemised restaurant bill before paying as the staff are quite unprofessional.
text:
We stayed here recently in one of the heritage rooms which was quite nice but extremely noisy as there were wedding photos being taken outside our room from 6.45 am until 8am as it was raining. Very unsatisfactory. 

The night of our arrival we ate dinner in the restaurant and enjoyed a few beers as it was my husband’s birthday. The next morning we checked out and settled the bill which was more than we were expecting. We were not provided with an itemised restaurant bill. Later, when we checked into another hotel we rechecked the bill and realised we had been charged for at least 4 more beers than we consumed. This is very disappointing for a hotel of this calibre. All restaurant bills should be itemised and produced at check out so they can be scrutinised by the customer. Very unprofessional practice and I would certainly not recommend this hotel given our experience.
title: Overcharged

text: In the heart of Jaffna, fox resort hotel is well located. The garden and the pool are beautiful and well maintained. It is a peaceful place in the middle of the busy city. The staff is very useful and friendly, ready to accommodate all our requests with smile. The food was traditional Sri Lanka cuisine. They have 2 museums to visit: one dedicated to art and famous painters and the other one about Jaffna history. The bedroom was comfortable with view on the garden. We saw several weddings celebrating in the hotel’s garden, it was amazing to see colorful dresses with palm trees in the background. Really recommend this hotel while staying in Jaffna.
title: Peaceful hotel in the middle of busy Jaffna city

placeInfo: {'id': '12210527', 'name': 'Fox Resorts Jaffna', 'rating': 5, 'numberOfReviews': 399, 'locationString': 'Jaffna, Northern Province', 'latitude': 9.701406, 'longitude': 80.01645, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304135-d12210527-Reviews-Fox_Resorts_Jaffna-Jaffna_Northern_Province.html', 'website': 'https://www.foxresorts.com/fox-jaffna', 'address': '257 KKS Road, Kokuvil, Jaffna, Jaffna 40000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '257 KKS Road, Kokuvil, Jaffna', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Jaffna', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '40000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 1, 'count2': 2, 'count3': 10, 'count4': 64, 'count5': 323}}
text:
VERY GOOD AND CLEAN ROOMS, CLEAN POOL SITUATED IN A WONDERFUL GARDEN.
VERY FRIENDLY STAFF, ESPECIALLY MR.PRABU (FRONT OFFICE) WAS EXTREMELY HELPFUL AND WENT OUT OF HIS WAY TO SOLVE A PROBLEM FOR US. IN THE RESTAURANT MR. SCOTTY ALSO WAS VERY COMMITED AND STRIVING TO SATISFY ALL RESTAURANT GUESTS. ONE NEGATIVE POINT: THE ATMOSPHERE IN THE RESTAURANT HALL IS SOMEWHAT LIKE A CANTEEN AND A LITTLE BIT MORE CHOICE OF DISHES WOULD HAVE BEEN NICE, ESPECIALLY FOR THOSE WHO CANNOT EAT RICE AND CURRY. HOWEVER, THE QUALITY OF FOOD WAS VERY GOOD. WE CAME WITH A FAMILY OF 9 PERSONS INCLUDING 4 CHILDREN AND WE WILL COME AGAIN.
title: BEST HOTEL EXPERIENCE WE HAVE HAD IN JAFFNA SO FAR

text:
The rooms are spacious, beds are comfortable, this hotel is a true haven of peace. You can even learn more about Jaffna’s history since there is a gallery in the basement. 
Special mention for all the lovely staff (and in particular Scoty) who took great care of me. 
It’s really enjoyable when travelling alone! 

And if you want to try Sri Lankan food (and specialities of the north) you are in good hands too, all the dishes were really tasty! I definitively recommend this hotel.
title: Great experience!

roomTip:
Our driver stayed there too at no additional cost and found it very clean and hospitable.
Nice quiet area yet close to Jaffna central
text:
Beautiful hotel with stunning grounds and a wonderfully friendly staff. We stayed as an extended family (4 double/twin rooms)  of 8 people. Rooms 17-20 look out onto the swimming pool and grounds which are close to the dining area. Very clean rooms and well furnished although they are looking a bit tired in certain places. AC was much needed at this time of year and we were very comfortable.

Breakfast was a combination of SL and continental. Plentiful range of options which changes from day to day. Also tried buffet dinner on 1st night - crab curry was excellent. 

If you are looking for a boutique style hotel, this is the place in Jaffna.

Overall, thoroughly enjoyed our 3 night stay but what made it exceptional was the staff. Scotty and Amit in particular were fantastic and highly accommodating arranging for French toast and pancakes for the kids breakfast. We’ll certainly be back.
title: Beautiful boutique hotel and exceptional staff

text: This hotel is located juust outside the main market area in Jaffna. It is on a main road, but you honestly would never be able to tell. So quiet and tranquil when you step into the grounds of this property. My friend and I had a very spacious room with twin bedding, seating area with views over the pool and very clean. The staff are so friendly and helpful at the restaurant, entrance and reception. Pool and grounds are impeccable. There is also a cool bunker art gallery you can enter from the reception building.  Would highly recommend using this as your base in Jaffna!
title: Great little oasis in Jaffna

placeInfo: {'id': '12210527', 'name': 'Fox Resorts Jaffna', 'rating': 5, 'numberOfReviews': 399, 'locationString': 'Jaffna, Northern Province', 'latitude': 9.701406, 'longitude': 80.01645, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304135-d12210527-Reviews-Fox_Resorts_Jaffna-Jaffna_Northern_Province.html', 'website': 'https://www.foxresorts.com/fox-jaffna', 'address': '257 KKS Road, Kokuvil, Jaffna, Jaffna 40000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '257 KKS Road, Kokuvil, Jaffna', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Jaffna', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '40000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 1, 'count2': 2, 'count3': 10, 'count4': 64, 'count5': 323}}
text:
The service was excellent with the staff being polite, pleasant and responsive at all times. The young man Amit Kumar in the restaurant service was in particular very helpful in assisting us to plan our itinerary for sights to see. 
The bunkers housing an art gallery and museum was unusual and worth checking out.
The heritage rooms we stayed in had an old world character and were spacious. 
However our stay was marred by some sort of an animal  (cat?)  running around in the false ceiling of the room making a loud noise and creating a major disturbance during sleep time as well.  The staff tried but could not solve the problem.  This was unacceptable,  particularly in the higher priced heritage rooms. 
The restaurant ambience could have been better although the service was good.  The food was not great either, with a limited choice.
title: Good in parts!

text:
An Oasis of a hotel in hot Jaffna . Beautiful cool garden  with palm trees and mangoe trees.  Praceful well appointed Chalets all facing the pool.The reception and the dinning room /restaurant is part of a1908 built colonial house very sympathetically renovated and houses a fantastc collection of
Art and history in  its basement .The rooms are also adjourned with famtastic pieces of art
You wouldnt think that you are in Jaffna when you are having a cool beer in the garden in the evening .                                               Everything in this hotel was amazing .The staff was the best
Polite attentive and going out of their way to accommodate the guests . All guests I am sure felt the same. Stotty was the best. Amazing service friendly and efficient.  We were a group of 12 visiting from Colombo.The food was lovely as well a mix of local Jaffna food and continental varieties .                                           Our only regret is that we couldnt stay longer .A bit expensive for Jaffna hotels but if you can afford  undoubtedly the Best place to stay in Jaffna .Wr sure will be returning .
title: Best Place to stay in Jaffna Srilanka

placeInfo: {'id': '3791995', 'name': 'Jaffna Heritage Hotel', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 442, 'locationString': 'Jaffna, Northern Province', 'latitude': 9.670952, 'longitude': 80.02786, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304135-d3791995-Reviews-Jaffna_Heritage_Hotel-Jaffna_Northern_Province.html', 'website': 'https://www.facebook.com/jaffnaheritage/', 'address': '195 Temple Rd, Jaffna 40000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '195 Temple Rd', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Jaffna', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '40000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 14, 'count2': 8, 'count3': 42, 'count4': 87, 'count5': 291}}
text:
We stayed here recently for seven nights (one night in the Heritage Villa) during the Nallur Temple Festival. The hotel is extremely comfortable with spacious bedrooms and bathrooms and a great pool. There is ample space for luggage, a good safe, fridge, efficient AC and comfortable king sized beds. 

Breakfast was included and is delicious. Due to the Hotel’s proximity to the temple the hotel must serve vegetarian meals and these are very tasty with various new dishes added each day. 

The hotel is in an excellent location as it is so close to the temple and also some very good restaurants.

It is the wonderful staff though that really makes the experience at this hotel outstanding. Veejay, Rajeeben and everyone else who works at the hotel (and the villa) are just fantastic and went out of their way to help us. For example, on arrival at the hotel when we were just about to head out VeeJay told us about the PickMe App. We both downloaded it and used it throughout our stay which not only saved us money but also the hassle of trying to explain our destination and also having to haggle the price with the driver. 

We also saw some interesting birds in the trees outside.

Highly recommended!
title: Outstanding Heritage Hotel

text: Had a great time at Jaffna Heritage Hotel! The entire menu was vegetarian, but the variety was amazing, with a unique Jaffna twist to the flavors. The ambiance was incredibly calming—you could even hear the distant pooja from Nallur Kovil, which added a serene vibe. The hotel is built to blend with nature, making it a peaceful spot to relax for a few days. The staff was super helpful, guiding us on what to see around Jaffna and where to eat. They also shared some fascinating historical insights about the area, which was a nice touch.
title: Serene Stay with a Flavorful Jaffna Twist

text: it was my first trip to jaffna that i was delaying for so long, one of the main reasons was the lack of nice hotels in this area. i saw heritage hotel posted on my friend’s socials and that’s how i finally defined my stay and booked a trip to the city. the location of jaffna heritage hotel was perfect, i like to walk and it was essential for me to get to all of the main attractions by walk. i think i could see every corner of the city in just 2 days because of the perfect placement of the hotel. also, the staff was very friendly and nice to have a conversation with ❤️ and need to mention the room cleanliness, great pool that is a must on a hot jaffna day, and wonderful breakfasts in tamil style with some indian notes, it was so delicious and very different.
title: central, quiet, tasty 😋

text: What a fantastic hotel and experience!! It’s more than just a hotel at Jaffna Heritage, the people working there truly care about you and your experience. You can ask them anything and they are extremely knowledgeable about the area surrounding and more. You are very close to most things in Jaffna. Also the beds are super comfy, AC in the room for that Jaffna heat, hot showers, drinking water provided daily, high ceiling spacious rooms. I only have good things to say about this hotel, I would highly recommend to anyone visiting or staying in Jaffna. I  also loved that the whole hotel is vegetarian due to the proximity to the temple!
title: Incredible stay in the heart of Jaffna

text:
Jaffna is truly a hidden gem 💎 
Anyone visiting srilanka should visit jaffna.! My stay at jaffna heritage hotel was amazing. Hospitality was on point. Breakfast had authentic jaffna food. We were greeted with huge smiles everywhere we went. Not everyone knows about jaffna but the simplicity of this place blew us away. 5 minutes away from the nallur temple. 🥰
I will come back again! 
Leaving jaffna with a huge smile on my face and my heart full.
title: Jaffna a hidden gem 💎

We booked for 2 nights and stayed for 4!  
Great clean comfortable rooms, with quiet ac. The location is close to the temple, and a 5 min tuktuk ride to town. We were well looked after by Wije and his team  - he organized our transport back to Colombo, a local island trip, and had great local recommendations. Best of all is the food - it’s a vegetation dream come true!

text:
5 star quality with exceptional customer service. I have been to hotels in 1st world countries that dont compare. This too at a fraction of the price.

The staff also, regardless of their background are well versed in all main languages (English, Tamil, Sinhalese). This goes a long way in accommodating to the customers and making them feel welcome.

Even more so, nice to see the unity between Tamils and Sinhalese after the troubles that they have been through.
title: Spectacular experience and will be back.

text:
I went to Jaffna for a wedding. It was my first stay at North Gate Hotel, I stayed there by myself. The stay at the Hotel made me proud of my own roots. There are so many remarkable gestures in our culture. The straff were super friendly, and made sure that I had everything I needed to have a comfortable stay. When you entered the Hotel after going out, they welcomed you in a way that felt like returning home. The housekeeping staff made sure your room was always tidy and clean, and they also often asked if everything was in order. 

I like to especially mention Sajanthan (housekeeping), Gousikan (reception), and Thuzhanty (reception) for making me feel so apprecited both as a guest and as a person🙂 Thank you so much! 

Looking forward to return to my roots and North Gate Hotel🙂
title: Heartwarming stay

text: Really enjoyed my stay at the Jaffna North Gate hotel. The staff were very friendly and helpful. The food was great as I really loved the authentic Sri Lankan Jaffna style curry’s. One cool tip I learned was that if you book your stay with the hotel itself rather than a booking website, you will get a better variety of deals that the sites don’t offer you. Overall had a great stay! One more thing , next to main railways station.
title: NorthGate Hotel

roomTip: Carry extra supplies of toilet paper and toiletries
text: Great location, clean, neat, large rooms and food was great.  Service was great except for housekeeping...  asked for Laundery bag and had to wait a long time to get it, toilet paper and shower gel not replenished on second day and was not forthcoming even after making a special request at reception.  Fortunately we carry emergency supplies.  Don't recommend doing any Laundery via the hotel.  They outsource and it cost an arm and a leg, more than anywhere else in the world... over USD35 for a medium load.  I misread the laundery form to mean rupees instead of USD. Would never have done the laundery vis the hotel if I read the form correctly.
title: Great Stay

text: I would highly recommend this hotel to anyone planning to visit Jaffna and seeking convenient access to the city center. Its proximity to the Jaffna railway station is a significant advantage. Furthermore, the guest rooms are spacious and meticulously maintained.

text:
I had such an outstanding experience at this hotel, I HAD to return during my next visit to Jaffna. I was met with the VERY same standard of care! 

The cleanliness and hospitality are outstanding. 

The pool and gym are spacious and well-maintained, and the views are breathtaking. 

The restaurant is stunning, and room service is impressively fast. 

The staff, including Gopi (manager), Praveen, Jeeva, and Nivethika, are respectful, accommodating, and made my stay truly memorable. 

Highly recommend and coming back again !!!
title: Sooooo good I couldn’t gatekeep !!

text: This is our second time staying at North Gate Hotel and it definitely will not be our last. My family and I thoroughly enjoyed our recent stay at North Gate Hotel and can not fault it one bit. All of the staff members (reception team, waiters, domestics team) contributed greatly to making our stay smooth and enjoyable. They attended to all our needs promptly and with smiles on their faces. The staff were all so warm and welcoming and we can’t thank them enough for their exceptional service. We were greeted by Sam when we came down to the restaurant for breakfast on a daily basis. He was very attentive, friendly and even offered us advice on places to visit whilst in Jaffna. The variety and quality of the food options available at the breakfast buffet breakfast were fantastic and it all tasted just as good as it looked! I will not hesitate to recommend North Gate hotel to anyone planning to visit Jaffna. 10/10 experience.
title: Lovely Hotel with exceptional food and hospitality

roomTip: Nearby Machang Jaffna is also good for a break out beer and bar menu
text: Formerly a Jetwing Hotel (and still appears listed as such in some places online).  Excellent location close to the Railway Station, and within in enjoyable walking distance of the markets and the tourist attractions in the centre of the enjoyable compact tropical city. Good hotel services including a very well-maintained pool. Rooms are spacious and the beds comfortable. The reception area could do with some redesign and improved lighting to create a stronger sense of welcome. Especially enjoyable was the main restaurant under the control of the restaurant manager, Sam. A real professional monitoring all dishes leaving the open kitchen and expertly guiding all the friendly floor staff team. The meals were excellent with a great chef leading the kitchen. Generally, the spiciness of the meals was toned down a bit for Western tastes, but it was simple to ask dishes be cooked “as the locals would like, as your mother would cook.”
title: Excellent dining leads a good hotel experience

text: I recently stayed at this hotel for the second time over the past five days. The service provided by the front desk, room service, and restaurant staff was exceptional—they were all well-presented, friendly, and attentive. The restaurant offered exceptional traditional Jaffna style food, which brought back cherished childhood memories for us. The management staff deserves special praise for maintaining high spirits and ensuring that the staff consistently deliver top-notch service. We look forward to returning on our next visit. Keep up the great work!
title: Best Jaffna Breakfast - Home away from Home

text: Really nice hotel with amazing staff and a great restaurant. Everyone was so kind, welcoming and attentive. Be it their breakfast spread, or lunch option or dinner - it was sumptuous. All the staff, the chef and the manager were very attentive to details and were amazing hosts. I stayed there 10 days and met with many of them, had great chats with many of them including Y Roshanth, who I spoke to the most. Thanks North gate team - can’t wait to come again sometime.
title: Great place, great food but best are the staff

roomTip: I didn't use the pool so I can't  comment  nothing on that and I want.
text:
Hotel was super clean, bathroom was like brand new. Staff was friendly special  thanks to Parveen who convinced me. 

During the conversation I had with parveen  I decided to book through Bookings.com.  also  hotel previous reviews I went through them too.

Breakfast Buffet floor manager 
Mr. Ramesh was so helpful explaining the best green drinks they make daily. 

I also met the owner, I mentioned to him how great the staff & overall hotel is well kept.

Since I lived in US I always looking for a super clean bathroom I found at this hotel.

I will come back and would recommend to any foreigner or any Sri-Lankans who are looking a super clean worth your money and this is the spot.

 One jump  from Jaffna railway just 3 minutes walking distance to the hotel.

Thank yoy each member in the hotel who were very courteous during our stay. 
Very special thanks to Mr Ramesh and Paraveen at front desk.
title: One night stay in North Gate Hotel

roomTip:
- Pool is little small and sunny, best time is around 4.00 pm
- Breakfast starts from 7.00 am to 10.00 am and Dinner starts at 7.00 pm to 10
text:
We were there from 7th April to 10th April where had a spent a great holiday with my wife and two kids. We arrived there around 10.30am after 10hrs long drive all the way from GALLE to Jaffna and Hotel was allowed us early check in. Our booking was BB, but the Manager offered us Half board at a discounted price and that was awesome. 

Food was excellent and we enjoyed with their great hospitality. There is pool at the 1st floor where closer to the restaurant and you can order any foods or drinks to the pool area and enjoy.
title: Had a Great experience with my family and two Kids.

placeInfo: {'id': '13559027', 'name': 'North Gate Hotel', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 353, 'locationString': 'Jaffna, Northern Province', 'latitude': 9.664513, 'longitude': 80.02043, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304135-d13559027-Reviews-North_Gate_Hotel-Jaffna_Northern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://northgatejaffna.com/', 'address': '136 Station Road, Jaffna 40000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '136 Station Road', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Jaffna', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '40000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 7, 'count2': 8, 'count3': 25, 'count4': 67, 'count5': 246}}
roomTip: The pool gets crowded on weekend evenings, so snag a spot early on, to secure a beach chair.
text: My top pick for a stay in Jaffna is undoubtedly North Gate Jaffna. We, a group of six, stayed for just over a week, booking a suite and a deluxe twin room. Upon arrival, we were greeted with welcome drinks and a friendly staff team. Gopinath, the front office manager, made sure our experience was comfortable throughout our stay. The hotel excelled in every aspect, from food and entertainment to accommodations. The restaurant offered a diverse menu, ensuring we always had new dishes to try. Room service was both quick and exceptionally friendly, much to my children’s delight. Kajintharan, who deserves a special mention, kept our room spotless daily and amused the kids with multiple towel animals. Having visited several other hotels and restaurants in Jaffna, I can confidently say none compare to North Gate Jaffna. It's the ideal choice for anyone seeking comfort, great food, and entertainment, complete with a well-maintained, sizable swimming pool.
title: Unmatched Comfort and Hospitality at North Gate Jaffna: A Family's Perfect Stay

text: Located right next to Jaffna station, Northgate Hotel is comfortable stay for a short trip to Jaffna. The breakfast buffet was lavish (and included in the price), the staff was coureous and helpful and the Machang Bar behind the hotel was a great place to relax in the evening. The rooms are large (with balconies), the bathrooms were clean (though the fixtures could do with an upgrade) and the staff made it worth it. It's a short tuk ride to the fort and the Kovil,

placeInfo: {'id': '9566109', 'name': 'Jetwing Jaffna', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 781, 'locationString': 'Jaffna, Northern Province', 'latitude': 9.664573, 'longitude': 80.01364, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304135-d9566109-Reviews-Jetwing_Jaffna-Jaffna_Northern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.jetwinghotels.com/jetwingjaffna/', 'address': '37 Mahatma Gandhi Road, Jaffna 40000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '37 Mahatma Gandhi Road', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Jaffna', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '40000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 20, 'count2': 14, 'count3': 61, 'count4': 273, 'count5': 413}}
text:
1.	Good Points
a.	This hotel is situated well. 5-10Min walk to a shopping mall and to Jaffna town.
b.	The room and toilet were clean.
c.	The staffs were friendly and very accommodating to our requests.
d.	The hotel had a rooftop bar (which has a bar) overlooking Jaffna Town and the nearby sea. This was my personal favorite.
e.	The buffet breakfast had decent amount of variety, mostly Indian food of course, but it was nice.
f.	The food served in their restaurant called Peninsula, was very good.

2.	Bad Points
a.	I paid USD100 Per Night (including taxes) for the Deluxe room. Sadly, the room came with limited view of the town. My room’s balcony was facing another building’s wall.
b.	The hotel doesn’t have a swimming pool

3.	Will I return again to this hotel?
Yes, because choices of good and reputable hotels in Jaffna are limited.
title: Nice Hotel. No Regrets!

text:
We stayed at Jetwing Jaffna, a city hotel that offers a decent experience. The room was okay, but what truly stood out was the Jaffna dinner buffet—simply top-notch! The variety and quality of the food were impressive and made the dining experience memorable.

Be sure to check out the reel on Jetwing Jaffna and follow our pages for more content on Instagram and TikTok @lankan_quests!

text:
This is my first time visit to Jaffna and decided to go for a reputed hotel chain to stayover and to have meals. Since my experience was excellent in other hotels of the Jetwing chain, decided to select Jaffna Jetwing.

I stayed overnight, had lunch at the restaurant and dinner with drinks at the rooftop bar.

The experience, in a nutshell was amazing from the reception of the hotel to the rooftop bar. Staff were friendly and efficient although they look very young and new to the trade.

Would recommend anyone visiting Jaffna to select Jaffna Jetwing.
title: The experience, in a nutshell was amazing

text: We were welcomed with a cold towel and wood-apple juice. Our room had a view to the lagoon and the fort which we appreciated. It was good being within walking distance of the sights we wanted to see. The restaurant is very nicely set out with the buffet options well displayed. The staff are very attentive. But even in a top hotel the food was far from hot, except for the dishes cooked especially for you. The Jaffna Night food buffet was excellent with so many different tastes (although one soup was far too spicy for us). The restaurant was full that night but there were no issues accessing the food. There are two lifts so there was little waiting even on 6th floor. Reception staff were helpful in changing money into smaller notes and providing an extra bed sheet for one of us who found sleeping under a doona too hot.
title: Great view

roomTip: Be far from lifts as they ping throughout the night
text:
Rooms are small but functional. However, they can’t deal with things or fix things quickly eg broken hairdryer took an hour to fix and despite asking 5 times for a temporary hairdryer for the interim they actually wouldn’t supply one. Being a women - even a 20 min wait is going to wreck your timings and worse, your blow dry.  I hate being told “yes maam, I’m sending one now” and it NEVER appearing 5 times!  I actually asked to be let into my brothers room however they never checked my credentials so anyone can enter your room. Be warned. 
Lastly, at dinner, it took over an hour from starters to main courses to arrive. Grandparents and kids fell asleep waiting….
title: Poor management

text:
Our first visit to Jaffna (and Jetwing Jaffna) was during the solar eclipse in December 2019, during which we really didn't have enough time to see and do much.
We learned our lesson, and this time booked a stay for 3 nights. The hotel staff was helpful even before we got there, with advice on what to see and what to do during our stay. 
We enjoyed the best of service from everyone we met. They had only 2 buffets while we were there, due to low occupancy over weekdays; however a la carte and set menus were really good. 
Thank you for a wonderful, relaxing stay up north. We look forward to our next visit, where we plan to spend 1 night on the Delft island.
title: It was good to be back!

placeInfo: {'id': '9566109', 'name': 'Jetwing Jaffna', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 781, 'locationString': 'Jaffna, Northern Province', 'latitude': 9.664573, 'longitude': 80.01364, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304135-d9566109-Reviews-Jetwing_Jaffna-Jaffna_Northern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.jetwinghotels.com/jetwingjaffna/', 'address': '37 Mahatma Gandhi Road, Jaffna 40000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '37 Mahatma Gandhi Road', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Jaffna', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '40000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 20, 'count2': 14, 'count3': 61, 'count4': 273, 'count5': 413}}
roomTip:
No room service. 
No swimming pool.
Get a higher floor room to avoid mosquitoes. 
The buffet is expensive.
Terrible Wifi.
text:
Jetwing Jaffna is a good hotel but it's nowhere near a 4-star hotel. At best its 3-stars. 

Location - Situated in the heart of Jaffna near all the tourist places and city centre. Very easy to get to. There is a supermarket right next to the hotel and a food court. Can't get better than this. 

Staff - The staff are lovely and diverse and speak several languages. They also worked together really well. But, the receptionist got my credit card details wrong from booking.com and couldn't charge my card. So I had 5 different staff constantly interrupting me while I was trying to eat dinner. They probably thought I was going to eat and do a runner. I wish the staff and trained better on how to treat customers in these situations. It was awkward. The reception is always empty and the staff are always away for some reason. 

Food - The food is authentic and tasty. Especially Jaffna dishes. But the cold selection is poor. It was confusing too. They had everything from noodles to bacon, pancakes, eggs and pizza for breakfast. The weirdest breakfast combination I've ever seen. The staff didn't tell me or show me around so I ate noodles for breakfast without knowing there was a buffet with Srilankan food. Instead of them trying to do everything they should stick to one theme. The dinner was nice but x5 expensive than some of the resturants charge near by. They even charge 5000 rupees for a toddler.

Rooms - The rooms are clean. But, there are maintenance issues. The hot water didn't work, I had to call reception to get someone to fix it. But, it turns out you need to open the tap in a certain way to get hot water. It was bad and I ended up showering in the cold. But, other than that the bathrooms are spacious and clean. There aren't any room service so you buy some snacks. 

Overall it's a nice little hotel but not worth the price. I would return because there aren't any other hotels in Jaffna with this standards.
title: Decent hotel but room for improvement.

roomTip: Very much a city centre business hotel, NOT a holiday destination
text: We were sold the hotel as 4* suitable for a holiday stay when visiting northern Sri Lanka.  It is really a 3* businessman's establishment, with no pool and few concessions to the holiday traveller.  Excellent for central Jaffna, to visit the fort, but not much else. placeInfo: {'id': '9566109', 'name': 'Jetwing Jaffna', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 781, 'locationString': 'Jaffna, Northern Province', 'latitude': 9.664573, 'longitude': 80.01364, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304135-d9566109-Reviews-Jetwing_Jaffna-Jaffna_Northern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.jetwinghotels.com/jetwingjaffna/', 'address': '37 Mahatma Gandhi Road, Jaffna 40000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '37 Mahatma Gandhi Road', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Jaffna', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '40000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 20, 'count2': 14, 'count3': 61, 'count4': 273, 'count5': 413}}
roomTip: The supermarket next door is useful for drinks, snacks and other basic needs - and there's a tuk-tuk rank 50 metres from the hotel.
text:
My first-ever experience of Sri Lankan accommodation, before learning more about the country (I'm now a veteran - 6 days and 3 accommodation locations in!)

Jaffna is less affluent than some other Sri Lankan towns/areas/provinces, partly because of the long 80s-00s civil war. With this as an underlying caveat, the Jetwing hotel was excellent - brilliant base location; professional staff; great accommodation; sublime, extensive food options for breakfast and lunch.

We didn't do A La Carte dining - instead, pizzas and drinks on the unexpectedly mosquito-free rooftop terrace, which is a lovely place to wile away 2-3 hours. But I have zero doubt the dinner would have been fab too.

I'm very hard pressed to find any "improvement point" for the Jetwing, given the Jaffna setting - they had a delicious wedding anniversary chocolate cake to greet us in our room, how lovely? - so the only thing is "would have appreciated an armchair in our room".

Overall - unreservedly recommended, as place from which to dive into the comp!ex but totally vibrant culture and geography on this northern tip of Sri Lanka
title: High-quality base for local discovery and adventures, with sublime food

roomTip: No Swimming pool in the hotel premises
text:
Outstanding hotel with exceptional service and incredibly welcoming staff who provide delightful cuisine. The property is impeccably clean and well-kept. We appreciate the managers and chefs engaging with customers to address their specific preferences. Additionally, the staff kindly accommodated our early morning check-in due to our early train arrival, which was a truly appreciated gesture.

The only issue we encountered was the need for greater cultural sensitivity regarding the buffet layout. It would be preferable for pork items to be kept separately to respect all cultures. Placing them next to seafood or other items where children may accidentally serve themselves creates discomfort and could affect our willingness to try other dishes like chicken or fish.
title: Exceptional Hospitality with Room for Cultural Sensitivity Improvement!

text:
A clean and pleasant hotel with exceptional staff who were friendly, polite and. extremely helpful. The room was a bit cramped as we had an extra bed in it but perfectly satisfactory otherwise. The view from the balcony was enhanced by a pair of Brahmani Kites nesting in a coconut tree just a few metres away. The breakfast and dinner was excellent with a wide choice of food including TRADITIONAL Jaffna curries. There was no restrictions on the quantity you took. It is not the most luxurious hotel I have stay in but certainly one of the best.
.
title: A great place with brilliant staff and fabulous food.

placeInfo: {'id': '9566109', 'name': 'Jetwing Jaffna', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 781, 'locationString': 'Jaffna, Northern Province', 'latitude': 9.664573, 'longitude': 80.01364, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304135-d9566109-Reviews-Jetwing_Jaffna-Jaffna_Northern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.jetwinghotels.com/jetwingjaffna/', 'address': '37 Mahatma Gandhi Road, Jaffna 40000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '37 Mahatma Gandhi Road', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Jaffna', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '40000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 20, 'count2': 14, 'count3': 61, 'count4': 273, 'count5': 413}}
text:
Our family vacation at Jetwing Jaffna in December 2023 was a delightful experience that exceeded our expectations in many ways. We stayed for two nights in their deluxe room, which provided a comfortable and spacious retreat for our family.

Location and Atmosphere: The hotel’s location is its standout feature, being conveniently close to the city center while also offering a serene and calm atmosphere. This balance was perfect for our family, allowing us to explore Jaffna with ease while also enjoying peaceful moments at the hotel.

Room and Amenities: The deluxe room was well-equipped, comfortable, and maintained to a high standard of cleanliness. However, we felt the addition of a couple of chairs in the room would have been beneficial, providing extra comfort and convenience.

Rooftop Bar and Dining: A highlight of our stay was the rooftop bar, offering a stunning 360-degree view of the surrounding area. It was a unique spot to unwind and take in the sights of Jaffna. The food options at the hotel were reasonable, catering to diverse tastes and preferences.

Service: The restaurant staff members were incredibly friendly and efficient, contributing significantly to our positive dining experiences. Their warmth and professionalism were notable and appreciated. Additionally, the WiFi connection was up to standard, and we were impressed by the staff's willingness to provide a separate 4G router free of charge upon request.

Areas for Improvement: While most of the service was exemplary, we did feel that the front office and security staff at the entrance could improve in terms of friendliness. As the first point of contact, their approach is crucial in setting the tone for guests’ stays. A more welcoming demeanor from these staff members would enhance the overall impression of the hotel.

Conclusion: Overall, our stay at Jetwing Jaffna was a memorable part of our family vacation. The hotel excelled in location, atmosphere, dining, and service, making it a commendable choice for families visiting Jaffna.
title: Enjoyable Family Stay with Impressive Hospitality at Jetwing Jaffna

placeInfo: {'id': '9566109', 'name': 'Jetwing Jaffna', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 781, 'locationString': 'Jaffna, Northern Province', 'latitude': 9.664573, 'longitude': 80.01364, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304135-d9566109-Reviews-Jetwing_Jaffna-Jaffna_Northern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.jetwinghotels.com/jetwingjaffna/', 'address': '37 Mahatma Gandhi Road, Jaffna 40000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '37 Mahatma Gandhi Road', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Jaffna', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '40000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 20, 'count2': 14, 'count3': 61, 'count4': 273, 'count5': 413}}
text: First of all the proximity of the hotel is the most relevant for guest to stay there.Food no words to say u get almost everything u look for in buffet and alacart.The restaurant Mr.Gokulan incharge and Sangeet are showing immense attachment with guest coming again and again asking anything they can do for us and serving something which is not in the menu happily with smiling face when we asked for banana milk shake.They gave curd more than five cups without hesitation and warm welcome they show when we enter each time I give them hats off for their service.Room service excellent job.Room and lobby and bar are very neat and clean.Rpof top bar has excellent view.Reception staff treat us like family helped each and every request we made.
title: Happy days in jetwing jaffna

roomTip: Large off street parking available.
text: A very comfortable hotel  with very friendly and helpful staff. The rooms are huge we had 304 on the ground floor. There is a separate lounge area with TV and bar fridge and then a large bedroom with a king size bed. The food was very good as well, could not fault anything we had. The first floor bar is a relaxing spot to have a drink. We were invited to a Hindu ceremony in reception and we were warmly incorporated into the staff group to participate, it was a very nice experience.
title: Excellent rooms, meals and service!

placeInfo: {'id': '10333832', 'name': 'The Thinnai', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 306, 'locationString': 'Jaffna, Northern Province', 'latitude': 9.686915, 'longitude': 80.026436, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304135-d10333832-Reviews-The_Thinnai-Jaffna_Northern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.thethinnai.com/home', 'address': '86 Palaly Road Thirunelveli, Jaffna 40000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '86 Palaly Road', 'street2': 'Thirunelveli', 'city': 'Jaffna', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '40000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 10, 'count2': 2, 'count3': 14, 'count4': 70, 'count5': 210}}

text:
An excellent hotel with clean and spacious rooms, great food and a very proactive and well mannered staff.

placeInfo: {'id': '10333832', 'name': 'The Thinnai', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 306, 'locationString': 'Jaffna, Northern Province', 'latitude': 9.686915, 'longitude': 80.026436, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304135-d10333832-Reviews-The_Thinnai-Jaffna_Northern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.thethinnai.com/home', 'address': '86 Palaly Road Thirunelveli, Jaffna 40000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '86 Palaly Road', 'street2': 'Thirunelveli', 'city': 'Jaffna', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '40000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 10, 'count2': 2, 'count3': 14, 'count4': 70, 'count5': 210}}
text:
We were given a very high recommendation to stay in this hotel. We found the staff very friendly and helpful. However, staff still need to be proactive. This is lacking considerably. For example, luggage was brought to our room but no one offered to bring it upstairs. The rooms were cleaned but towels not always replaced or plates / cutlery replaced. 
When you know that the customer is drinking tea, there was no initiative to leave more tea bags, instead I had to call every time. 
Not a big deal but areas for improvement.
Maintenance checks need to be done regularly before check-in. A bathroom sink was leaking which I found on arrival. It took the maintenance person over an hour to fix. There was also a loose sink fitting which was on one screw. Things that could be better. 

Additionally, better toiletries could also be provided for example control buds. 

Amutham restaurant was very nice. Saranya was really lovely. 

Room attendants Duvarakan and Dushyanthan were very good and with some extra training can be truly excellent.
The pool and gym looked good but we didn’t have time to use it.
The driver / chauffeur accommodation needs to be improved. They are the ones who will bring new business to the hotel and need to be taken care of.
Hotel location is really good with easy access to all parts of Jaffna.
title: Good location and ok hotel

placeInfo: {'id': '10333832', 'name': 'The Thinnai', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 306, 'locationString': 'Jaffna, Northern Province', 'latitude': 9.686915, 'longitude': 80.026436, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304135-d10333832-Reviews-The_Thinnai-Jaffna_Northern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.thethinnai.com/home', 'address': '86 Palaly Road Thirunelveli, Jaffna 40000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '86 Palaly Road', 'street2': 'Thirunelveli', 'city': 'Jaffna', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '40000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 10, 'count2': 2, 'count3': 14, 'count4': 70, 'count5': 210}}
text:
Good English spoken by the staff. 
A very clean hotel, good, authentic food in the restaurant, nice people working there. Very helpful. 

I left behind a shirt and they tried to give it to me as they thought i’d accidentally left it behind!

A good pool too if you’re looking to relax. A little oasis amongst the hustle a bustle. I had a great two nights of sleep here!
title: Great hotel in the centre of jaffna!

placeInfo: {'id': '10333832', 'name': 'The Thinnai', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 306, 'locationString': 'Jaffna, Northern Province', 'latitude': 9.686915, 'longitude': 80.026436, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304135-d10333832-Reviews-The_Thinnai-Jaffna_Northern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.thethinnai.com/home', 'address': '86 Palaly Road Thirunelveli, Jaffna 40000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '86 Palaly Road', 'street2': 'Thirunelveli', 'city': 'Jaffna', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '40000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 10, 'count2': 2, 'count3': 14, 'count4': 70, 'count5': 210}}
roomTip: This hotel offered driver accommodation and had ample parking
text: This was the largest hotel we stayed at during our 10 day tour of Sri Lanka and we absolutely loved every second of our stay; we arrived a couple of hours early and our rooms wasn’t quite ready so we left our bags at reception and went to the restaurant for lunch, the food and service we received was second to none and the whole hotel oozed opulence.  After lunch our room was ready and we were overawed by the size of the rooms we had and everything inside was to the highest standard even down to the toiletries provided in the bathroom, we only had two nights here and didn’t look to dine anywhere else and thoroughly enjoyed all the food and drink that was served to us.  We also used the swimming pool which was lovely with towels provided at poolside and an extremely helpful pool attendant.  Would we recommend this hotel and would we use it again, in a heart beat is our answer.  Thank you to all the staff who helped or served us, all in all a thoroughly enjoyable stay.
title: Luxurious, friendly hotel

roomTip: The restaurant and the food can be improved
text:
I recently stayed at Thinnai in Jaffna and had a great overall experience! The hotel's beautiful gardens and stunning architecture set the tone for a relaxing and peaceful stay. The rooms were comfortable and clean. 

The staff were friendly and helpful, and special mention to Delukshi for providing excellent service throughout our stay. She was very professional and very friendly .

The food was average and overpriced and the quality and service of the restaurant can be improved.

The hotel's location is perfect for exploring Jaffna’s historic sites, and the scenic views of the surrounding areas was very homely. 

I would definitely recommend Thinnai to anyone looking for a comfortable and relaxing stay in Jaffna. Great value for money, and I would happily return!
title: Beautiful Thinnai

text:
This is a beautiful property. The rooms are clean. The pool is clean and inviting. 
The staff are very polite and friendly. 
Only thing which lets this hotel down is the kitchen. 
The food I won't give more than 2 stars. It was neither Jaffna style or southern Srilankan style. 
When it was buffet it was ok, otherwise there was a long wait for the food ordered. 
It is a real shame for the price they charge for half-board it is very low quality food they offer. 
I will not be recommending half or full board.
title: The restaurant lets the property down

placeInfo: {'id': '10333832', 'name': 'The Thinnai', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 306, 'locationString': 'Jaffna, Northern Province', 'latitude': 9.686915, 'longitude': 80.026436, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304135-d10333832-Reviews-The_Thinnai-Jaffna_Northern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.thethinnai.com/home', 'address': '86 Palaly Road Thirunelveli, Jaffna 40000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '86 Palaly Road', 'street2': 'Thirunelveli', 'city': 'Jaffna', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '40000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 10, 'count2': 2, 'count3': 14, 'count4': 70, 'count5': 210}}
roomTip: Jaffna and northern Sri Lanka don’t have a lot of big attractions like the rest of the country but it is worth a visit.
text:
Stayed at this hotel for two nights on a tour of Sri Lanka. The rooms are more like an apartment than a hotel room - mine had two bedrooms, two bathrooms and a lounge/kitchen/dining area spread over two floors. The hotel also has a nice pool, a rooftop bar and a small restaurant. 
The staff at the hotel were wonderful - the manager helped me book an appointment with a local doctor, which I could not have done on my own and even followed up after my appointment to check I was OK. I would definitely recommend staying here if you are visiting Jaffna.
title: Great staff and a pleasant stay in Jaffna

placeInfo: {'id': '10333832', 'name': 'The Thinnai', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 306, 'locationString': 'Jaffna, Northern Province', 'latitude': 9.686915, 'longitude': 80.026436, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304135-d10333832-Reviews-The_Thinnai-Jaffna_Northern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.thethinnai.com/home', 'address': '86 Palaly Road Thirunelveli, Jaffna 40000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '86 Palaly Road', 'street2': 'Thirunelveli', 'city': 'Jaffna', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '40000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 10, 'count2': 2, 'count3': 14, 'count4': 70, 'count5': 210}}
roomTip: Jaffna is a busy noisy place but this Hotel is set back from the road, so quite peaceful.
text:
We stayed here with a group of 7 while on a tour with Inspiring vacations. The rooms were well set up with a lounge suite, wide screen TV, full size fridge ( with an ice block tray, bonus ) separate bedroom with another TV and a small balcony with a pool view.
They have family rooms with basic kitchen set ups as well. Definitely one of the largest rooms we have had on our 18 day tour.
The pool area had good use from our group and the Hotel surrounds are very quite and peaceful as there are no houses around the outside.
Staff were all very friendly and helpful. The evening buffets were really good. Breakfast for westerners is a work in progress but the local food is excellent.
title: Peaceful surrounds in Jaffna.

placeInfo: {'id': '10333832', 'name': 'The Thinnai', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 306, 'locationString': 'Jaffna, Northern Province', 'latitude': 9.686915, 'longitude': 80.026436, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304135-d10333832-Reviews-The_Thinnai-Jaffna_Northern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.thethinnai.com/home', 'address': '86 Palaly Road Thirunelveli, Jaffna 40000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '86 Palaly Road', 'street2': 'Thirunelveli', 'city': 'Jaffna', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '40000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 10, 'count2': 2, 'count3': 14, 'count4': 70, 'count5': 210}}

placeInfo: {'id': '10333832', 'name': 'The Thinnai', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 306, 'locationString': 'Jaffna, Northern Province', 'latitude': 9.686915, 'longitude': 80.026436, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304135-d10333832-Reviews-The_Thinnai-Jaffna_Northern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.thethinnai.com/home', 'address': '86 Palaly Road Thirunelveli, Jaffna 40000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '86 Palaly Road', 'street2': 'Thirunelveli', 'city': 'Jaffna', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '40000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 10, 'count2': 2, 'count3': 14, 'count4': 70, 'count5': 210}}
text: We stayed 4 nights in The Thinnai hotel. Our 2 bedroom suite was very spacious and comfortable, with 2 large bedrooms, 2 full bathrooms, living room with pull out couch and a kitchen with a full size refrigerator, microwave and a stove. The manager and other staff at the front desk were amazing. All the staff were very courteous and ready to please us. They cleaned our rooms everyday. We liked the eco friendliness of using glass bottles for drinking water. We loved using the pool in the evenings, very clean and welcoming. The food in the restaurant was delicious and the chef Gideon made custom Sri Lankan food that we were craving. There were Western and Sri Lankan dishes. We were so happy with Thinnai that we have already blocked rooms for our family reunion this Christmas for 35+ family members.
title: Wonderful stay in this charming comfortable hotel with delicious food!

text:
I was at this hotel last year n since it was good , we returned this year. However I was a bit disappointed with a few issues. First the rooms need a bit of TLC. We stayed in 201 n it wasn’t ready as the back was so dirty n had to be cleaned out. The maintenance man had to repair the cupboard. The back of this room is a shamble. 
The next issue were the towels - they are thread bare n a disgrace!
The restaurant needs a week of cleaning out- the windows etc. The menu too needs a change. The service staff are really good . The reception staff need more training to do anything out of the ordinary , like reserving a table for dinner or making an appointment for Ayurveda. 
Don’t get me wrong. I like the hotel n don’t like to see it deteriorating.
title: Needs TLC

text:
This really is a very comfortable hotel! We stayed for a couple of nights during a tour of Sri Lanka and were very impressed. The room was a 2 room suite which was a nice surprise. There was an attractive pool which unfortunately we didn’t have chance to use! 
There was a cosy bar above reception which was comfortable and relaxing. 
The restaurant is clearly a local attraction as it was busy - and deservedly so; the food was very tasty.

However one of the highlights of our holiday was the cooking demonstration by the chef & his team! We are now well equipped to make it at home! We really enjoyed talking to the team about their beautiful country. It was a very memorable evening with a delicious curry! Thank you very much!
title: High quality hotel!

I really liked the quality of the place. The rooms are very spaciou with separate lounge, bedroom and bathroom. Air con and fans throughout.

text:
We stayed in Mallihai suites. It was very spacious and clean.  The food was great and I like how they serve it.  They cleaned the house every day.  
I would like to specially mention Parameswaran and Thuvarakan. They did a fantastic job in making it very clean and tidy.  They both were friendly and polite too. I gave them a tip because of their excellent job but they refused to take it.  I couldn't believe it!!

The pool and the garden was maintained well. Felt like home.
title: Great stay

placeInfo: {'id': '10333832', 'name': 'The Thinnai', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 306, 'locationString': 'Jaffna, Northern Province', 'latitude': 9.686915, 'longitude': 80.026436, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304135-d10333832-Reviews-The_Thinnai-Jaffna_Northern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.thethinnai.com/home', 'address': '86 Palaly Road Thirunelveli, Jaffna 40000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '86 Palaly Road', 'street2': 'Thirunelveli', 'city': 'Jaffna', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '40000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 10, 'count2': 2, 'count3': 14, 'count4': 70, 'count5': 210}}
text:
Our extended family enjoyed a lovely six night stay at The Thinnai. The suites were spacious and had all the amenities we required. The young and the old enjoyed the pool. The gym was well equipped, with a range of free weights and cardio equipment. The restaurant had a variety of Sri Lankan and Western Cuisine. The hotel was also well located, 5-10 minute drive to Jaffna town.
The staff were amazing. From the front desk staff led by Mr. Prasana (Ninthojan, Mohanalatha, Robinatz, Srilaxshan, Sritharan), the restaurant staff led by Ms. Monisha, Housekeeping led by Mr. Parameswaran and the driving team led Mr. Nirushan were exemplary in their interaction, knowledge, helpfulness. Their efficiency of service further added to our holiday.
A big thanks to all and hope to see you again soon.
title: Wonderful stay at The Thinnai

placeInfo: {'id': '8513442', 'name': 'The Valampuri', 'rating': 4, 'numberOfReviews': 225, 'locationString': 'Jaffna, Northern Province', 'latitude': 9.664505, 'longitude': 80.02148, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304135-d8513442-Reviews-The_Valampuri-Jaffna_Northern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.valampurihotel.com', 'address': '148/10 Station Road, Jaffna 40000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '148/10 Station Road', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Jaffna', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '40000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 18, 'count2': 15, 'count3': 44, 'count4': 72, 'count5': 76}}
text:
Stay was excellent!
My relative recently stayed at the Valampuri Hotel in Jaffna, and I must say, I was pleasantly surprised by their experience. Initially, when they mentioned the hotel, I didn't expect much in terms of size, but my perception quickly changed once I heard about their stay. First and foremost, the food was a highlight. My relative couldn't stop raving about how tasty and satisfying the meals were. Moreover, the accommodation exceeded expectations. Despite any concerns about size, the comfort and quality of the rooms were worth every penny. It's reassuring to hear that the hotel delivers on its promise of a comfortable stay. However, what truly stood out was the exceptional service, particularly from a waiter named Kamalini. Their care and attention to detail made my relative feel like they were being looked after by a motherly figure, especially during breakfast. It's heartwarming to know that the staff goes above and beyond to ensure guests feel welcomed and cared for. Delicious food, comfortable accommodation, and attentive service made it a memorable stay. If you're looking for a hotel experience that exceeds expectations, this one comes highly recommended. Truly my entire family was happy and experienced a better location views in Jaffna.
title: Better hotel in jaffna

placeInfo: {'id': '8513442', 'name': 'The Valampuri', 'rating': 4, 'numberOfReviews': 225, 'locationString': 'Jaffna, Northern Province', 'latitude': 9.664505, 'longitude': 80.02148, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304135-d8513442-Reviews-The_Valampuri-Jaffna_Northern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.valampurihotel.com', 'address': '148/10 Station Road, Jaffna 40000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '148/10 Station Road', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Jaffna', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '40000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 18, 'count2': 15, 'count3': 44, 'count4': 72, 'count5': 76}}
text:
My clients stay at Valampuri Hotel in Jaffna was extremely disappointing. The hotel was shockingly dirty and clearly not well-maintained. The cleanliness standards were well below acceptable levels, with unkempt rooms and common areas. Additionally, the service was abysmal. Staff members were inattentive and unhelpful, showing a lack of professionalism and courtesy. Overall, I cannot recommend this hotel to anyone considering a stay in Jaffna. It was a regrettable experience that left me feeling thoroughly dissatisfied.

The lack of cleanliness was not confined to our room; it was evident throughout the hotel premises. Common areas were unkempt, and cleanliness standards were well below acceptable levels. This was deeply concerning and not in line with the standards one would expect from a reputable hotel.

Furthermore, the service we received was disappointing. Staff members appeared inattentive and unhelpful, lacking the professionalism and courtesy expected in the hospitality industry. Their demeanor only added to our dissatisfaction with our overall experience at Valampuri Hotel.

As a result of these issues, I regret to inform you that I cannot in good conscience recommend your hotel to anyone considering a stay in Jaffna. It is imperative that immediate action is taken to address the cleanliness issues and improve the quality of service provided to guests.

I urge you to take this feedback seriously and implement measures to rectify the shortcomings we experienced during our stay. Your prompt attention to these matters would be greatly appreciated and may help prevent similar negative experiences for future guests.
title: A Disappointing Experience: Dirty Rooms and Poor Service at Valampuri Hotel, Jaffna

placeInfo: {'id': '8513442', 'name': 'The Valampuri', 'rating': 4, 'numberOfReviews': 225, 'locationString': 'Jaffna, Northern Province', 'latitude': 9.664505, 'longitude': 80.02148, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304135-d8513442-Reviews-The_Valampuri-Jaffna_Northern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.valampurihotel.com', 'address': '148/10 Station Road, Jaffna 40000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '148/10 Station Road', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Jaffna', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '40000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 18, 'count2': 15, 'count3': 44, 'count4': 72, 'count5': 76}}
text:
9.66467°, 80.02149° very close the Jaffna train station, guests are woken early in the morning by the noise of trains. This multi-storey, multi-wing hotel tries to be a luxury hotel. 

In March 2024, room 361 (3F) with balcony was not cleaned properly. Due to the 2019 bombing and COVID-19 lockdown, investment in maintenance is clearly overdue. The air conditioner made a rattling noise. The ceiling fan allowed us to sleep on a comfortable double bed. The hot shower was good. The minibar was stocked with beer. Wi-Fi-reception was good. The hotel has a swimming pool, buffet restaurant and outside terrace. Breakfast of Sri Lankan and continental items was good. Laundry service was available. 

The Valampuri hotel offered a basic sleeping experience.
title: Basic sleeping experience

roomTip: Breakfast smells very good, most likely worth a try.
text:
Excellent stay, relaxing, refreshing, revolutionary. Loved every minute of it. 

I arrived last minute and was given a very nice balcony room.

Clean and presentable. Guards and dogs at the gates, felt very safe during the stay.

Beautiful comfy chairs in the lobby with mystical music.

Excellent service and attention to detail.

Reasonably priced; I would stay again. 

One improvement can be making sure all litter is cleared and touching up on cleaning. Otherwise a very good hotel, you will be pleased with your stay.
title: The Valampuri Hotel; very pleasant.
